about_the_game:
A backpack management + roguelike tower-climbing game with the theme of cultivating immortality.

【Backpack Management】

Through various distinctive items such as magic treasures, cultivation techniques, materials, defensive gear, and strategic orders, freely combine your construction strategies. Each playthrough will bring you a different experience.

【Tower-climbing Roguelike】

Climb the tower level by level for trials. There are four major scenes with their own characteristics, and you will challenge dozens of bosses with unique skills and behaviors.

【Challenge Players】

Challenge the mirror images of other players' equipment combinations and strive for the top position on the leaderboard.

【World Exploration】

Apart from the battles in the levels, the vast world is an area available for exploration, including hidden scenes like the "Ghost Market" and the "White Jade Capital" where you can explore and search for treasures.

name: Backpack Immortal Tale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX4060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A backpack management + roguelike tower-climbing game with the theme of martial arts. Obtain artifacts with unique features, build powerful combinations, challenge other players, and finally become a god!
